item.title: Talk: Silverstripe 4 Technical Roadmap (Stripecon Malta 2017)
item.description: Technical roadmap talk at Stripecon Malta in 2017, focused on what’s coming up in Silverstripe 4. See slides and talk recording.

item.title: Talk: React and Asset Abstraction in Silverstripe 4 (Silverstripe Meetup)
item.description: Roadmap update on the CMS UI redesign, React refactor and asset management overhaul in Silverstripe 4. See slides

item.title: Talk: Silverstripe 4 Roadmap Update (Stripecon APAC in Sydney)
item.description: Roadmap update at our first conference in Australia, see slides.
